text:
TAMIL NADU GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY
FINANCIAL MEMORANDUM
The Bill provides for the establishment of a Technical University at Madurai by the name "Anna University of Technology, Madurai". The Bill when enacted would involve expenditure from the Consolidated Fund of the State. It is however not possible at this stage to estimate with any degree of accuracy the expenditure to be incurred as a result of the proposed Legislation.
141
